message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you!
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle this. 55-45 is my final offer.
Considering the decreasing value, I think this is a fair offer for both of us, given the circumstances.
This is getting ridiculous Bob.  I'm taking a hit on the value, we need to close this deal.
Given the current situation, I believe this offer is reasonable and allows us both to walk away with something. Further delay will only decrease your share's value.
